title: Banana and chocolate loaf
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons of unsalted butter', '150g of caster sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '3 large ripe bananas, mashed', '8 tablespoons cocoa powder', '60g ground roast hazelnuts, ground', '175g of plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 tablespoons of milk']
